trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> will gain additional rows or columns after its existing cells are full.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il modo in cui un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> otterrà righe o colonne aggiuntive quando le celle esistenti risulteranno piene.

trans-unit.source: If all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are filled and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is set to FixedSize, an attempt to add another control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se tutte le celle di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> vengono riempiti e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> è impostata su FixedSize, un tentativo di aggiungere un altro controllo genererà un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize> to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize> per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> otterrà altre colonne quando sarà pieno.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional rows after it is full.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> otterrà altre righe quando sarà pieno.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> does not allow additional rows or columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> non consente l'aggiunta di altre righe o colonne quando è pieno.
